(St.) Vincent: Saint paired with the Grenadines in a country's name
Barbados: A type of raw sugar is named for this easternmost island of the West Indies
Grenada: Site of a 1983 U.S. invasion, it's also known as the Isle of Spice
Haiti: The reverend Gerard Jean-Juste championed the cause of refugees from this Caribbean country
Jamaica: Kingston & Montego Bay are 2 of its largest towns
